item.title: How much does electric car insurance actually cost in 2019?
item.description: There is a lot of disinformation out there that electric cars are more expensive than ICE vehicles to insure. A lot of this FUD (fear, uncertainty and doubt) is most likely spread by comapanies wanting electric cars to fail.
